Kabuto burrows underground and uses his chakra scalpels on the opponent's legs, making them immobile. Orochimaru then summons a large [[snake]] that crushes the opponent from above.

[[es:Bisturí de Chakra: Aglomeración de Serpiente]]
[[pt-br:Bisturi de Chakra do Esmagamento da Cobra]]
[[pl:Zmiażdżenie Węża Skalpelem Czakry]]
